getSmallEnoughFont

private static int getSmallEnoughFont(int w,
                                      int h,
                                      java.lang.String info,
                                      java.awt.Graphics g,
                                      int font)
Get the fontSize to make sure the text can be fully displayed

Parameters:
w - with of the rectangle containing the text
h - hight of the rect
info - text to show
g - Graphic used
font - fontsize
Returns:
the fontize (font) eventually decreased to make info fit into {w-2,h-2} the offset -2 is in order to make sure text will not be hidden by a border

Parameters:
x - x position of R
y - y position of R
w - width of R
info - text to display
g - Graphic
font - size of the font

getXFromValue

private double getXFromValue(double x,
                             double w,
                             int v)
Parameters:
x - horizontal position of the rectangle in which the interval window is included (legend, graphArea...)
w - width of this rectangle
v - value studied
Returns:
the x position corresponding to the value v
